text: Jens Adolf Jerichau (12 December 1890 - 16 August 1916) was a Danish painter. He inspired paintings by Asger Jorn and Per Kirkeby.Jens Adolf Jerichau - Louisiana Exhibition From October 2021, the Louisiana Museum of Modern Art (in Denmark), will show an exhibition of paintings by him. ==Related pages== *List of Danish painters ==References== Category:1890 births Category:1916 deaths Category:Danish painters
title: Jens Adolf Jerichau
